mapper.sql: PROCESS_NUM, APP_DEPT, VEH_CODE, APPLICANT, APPLICANT_EMAIL, APPLICANT_PHONE, PROVIDE_TYPE, IN_ACCEPTER, IN_DEPT, OUT_CPNY_NAME, OUT_CPNY_CODE, OUT_CPNY_ACCEPTER, OUT_CPNY_EMAIL, PRO_MANAGER_SUGGE, PRO_INSPECTOR_SUGGE, TITLE,PUBLISH_TIME
mapper.insert: insert into HZ_TEMPMAINRECORD (PROCESS_NUM, APP_DEPT, VEH_CODE, APPLICANT, APPLICANT_EMAIL, APPLICANT_PHONE, PROVIDE_TYPE, IN_ACCEPTER, IN_DEPT, OUT_CPNY_NAME, OUT_CPNY_CODE, OUT_CPNY_ACCEPTER, OUT_CPNY_EMAIL, PRO_MANAGER_SUGGE, PRO_INSPECTOR_SUGGE,TITLE ) values (#{processNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applicant,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applicantEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applicantPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provideType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inAccepter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outCpnyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outCpnyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outCpnyAccepter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outCpnyEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proManagerSugge,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proInspectorSugge,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into HZ_TEMPMAINRECORD (PROCESS_NUM, APP_DEPT, VEH_CODE, APPLICANT, APPLICANT_EMAIL, APPLICANT_PHONE, PROVIDE_TYPE, IN_ACCEPTER, IN_DEPT, OUT_CPNY_NAME, OUT_CPNY_CODE, OUT_CPNY_ACCEPTER, OUT_CPNY_EMAIL, PRO_MANAGER_SUGGE, PRO_INSPECTOR_SUGGE )
SELECT #{item.processNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.appDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vehCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.applicant,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.applicantEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.applicantPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.provideType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.inAccepter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.inDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.outCpnyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.outCpnyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.outCpnyAccepter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.outCpnyEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.proManagerSugge,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.proInspectorSugge,jdbcType=VARCHAR} from DUAL
mapper.update: update HZ_TEMPMAINRECORD set APP_DEPT = #{appDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VEH_CODE = #{vehCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPLICANT = #{applicant,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPLICANT_EMAIL = #{applicantEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPLICANT_PHONE = #{applicantPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROVIDE_TYPE = #{provideType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IN_ACCEPTER = #{inAccepter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IN_DEPT = #{inDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OUT_CPNY_NAME = #{outCpnyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OUT_CPNY_CODE = #{outCpnyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OUT_CPNY_ACCEPTER = #{outCpnyAccepter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OUT_CPNY_EMAIL = #{outCpnyEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRO_MANAGER_SUGGE = #{proManagerSugge,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRO_INSPECTOR_SUGGE = #{proInspectorSugge,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PROCESS_NUM = #{processNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update HZ_TEMPMAINRECORD set PUBLISH_TIME =sysdate where PROCESS_NUM = #{processNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
